alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:46PM EDT until March 31 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in south central Michigan... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 845 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Jonesville, or 12 miles north of Hillsdale, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Parma... Hanover... Jackson County Airpo... Oak Point... Tompkins... Rives Junction... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
